subsections.text:
Watson Analytics was one of the first projects that I worked on at IBM. Watson Analytics is a BI tool to help users understand and visualize both live and static data.

I worked mostly on the UX of the 'Display' section of Watson Analytics which encompassed many of the aspects of dashboarding and creating reports.

As part of this work, I also created a consumable style guide for the dev team to ensure consistency in styles / colors / componentry where possible, which was later integrated into many other products in the portfolio.
